Package ohos.media.audio

Class AudioDeviceDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.audio.AudioDeviceDescriptor

  • public class AudioDeviceDescriptor
extends Object
    Provides audio device details.

    The device details include the ID, name, address, type (defined by DeviceType), and role (defined by DeviceRole).

    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Multimedia#AUDIO

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(Object object)
        Checks whether the audio device details, including the ID, name, address, type, and role, specified by the input parameters of the AudioDeviceDescriptor method are the same as those of an existing audio device.

        This method overrides the equals method.

        Overrides:
        equals in class Object
        Parameters:
        object - Indicates an AudioDeviceDescriptor object.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the device details are the same; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1
        See Also:
        Object.hashCode(), HashMap

      • getChannelCounts

        public int[] getChannelCounts​()
        Obtains an array whose elements indicate the channel types supported by the device.

        For example, {1, 2, 4} indicates that the device supports single channel, dual channel, and quad channel. If the obtained array is empty, the device supports any channel types, including single channel, dual channel, quad channel, six channel, and eight channel.

        Returns:
        Returns the array.
        Since:
        1
